name: @hexlet/code
description: Set of 5 mathematical games: brain-even, brain-calc, brain-gcd, brain-progression and brain-prime. You must answer correctly three times in a row to win each game. If the answer is wrong, you can start any game again. [![Actions Status](https://github.com/Yannapfl/frontend-project-44/workflows/hexlet-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Yannapfl/frontend-project-44/actions)
